column4: HEy guys can someone explain to me why the 8.10 is comming so damn late?
8.10 was release in October of 2008 (hence: 8.10 , year.month)
I know that already BUT We here  get in the magazines the BETA of 8.10 and its 8.12 RIGHT NOW
8.10 was released in October of 2008, I downloaded it in October, regardless of what the magazine says
